channel.title: Hierarchies - related-activity definition (included 2.03)
channel.description:
This proposal is part of the [2.03 upgrade process](https://discuss.iatistandard.org/t/version-2-03-decimal-upgrade-index-of-proposals/838), please comment by replying below. **Standard** Activity **Schema Object** iati-activity/related-activity **Type of Change** Modify Definition **Issue** Users of data should always be able to detect the hierarchical relationship between activities through inspection of the related activity element. **Proposal** Modify definition of related-activity from:
      “Another separately reported IATI activity that is related to this one. The ‘type’ attribute describes the type of relationship: eg. parent, child, multifunded …”
to:
      “Another separately reported IATI activity that is related to this one. The ‘type’ attribute describes the type of relationship: (eg. parent, child, multifunded. It is strongly recommended that linkage between activities in an hierarchical group should always be managed by use of this element with @type of 1 (parent) or 2 (child).”
**Standards Day** Accepted **Links** Previous discussions - https://discuss.iatistandard.org/t/tech-paper-hierarchies/539/21
